name: Ricetta: panini di riso
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rice Buns.

value.name: Riso
value.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

value.name: Equiseto
value.desc: A purple plant that sometimes grows amidst Silvergrass but grows taller, straighter, and plumper â€” like an aristocrat among the paupers.

value.name: Panini di riso
value.desc: Soft and fluffy buns. The rice and horsetail have been ground into flour and kneaded into dough before being placed into a steaming basket. They can be eaten as-is or with a vegetable filling. Portable and satiating, it is a very popular dish in the Liyue region.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Chef Mao at Wanmin Restaurant</color>
